com.fluidops.ajax.components

Class FSlider.SliderOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fluidops.ajax.components.FSlider.SliderOptions
  • Enclosing class:
    FSlider

    public static class FSlider.SliderOptions
extends java.lang.Object
    holds all the options which are available and can be transformed to json do not rename variable names, if so change them accordingly isnide ajax.js

      how many numbers are shown underneath the ticks, default 2 start and end

      insert second slider for range selection
      boolean selectionOptional
      is the selection of a value optional (no value can be selected)

      Label for the unit of the slider values
